thread.title: CRAIG
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by CRAIG

author: CRAIG
title: CRAIG
text:
After booking a car with Budget and turning up at the airport with no booking or car availible, their attitude was "bad luck". No other rental companys had spare cars, the Red Spot guys went out of their way to solve my problem, find me a car and get me on my way for a short 3 day getaway. Hats off to the Launceston airport Red Spot staff.
Fail Budget Car Rentals, you can learn from your peers!!!!
